description: This course will help you learn how to create and increase your online platform. Utilizing Twitter, Periscope, Mailchimp, and Wordpress, this course will teach you how to market your services or products like a rockstar! As a self-published author, graphic designer, and small business owner, Ashley will teach you how to build your platform and avoid the many pitfalls he learned along the way. This course is essential to building a platform online. This course is guaranteed to help you build an audience and turn that audience into your own personal brand evangelists! By the end of this course, you will have a guaranteed formula for increasing followers and building a thriving online community.
title: Increasing Your Online Influence
